features.title: Smarter agents and better image handling on canvas
features.description:
New

‚Ä¢ Improved database editing experience with support for floating editors

‚Ä¢ Agents can now read and access asset images for better contextual understanding

Improvements

‚Ä¢ You can now copy selected images on the canvas

‚Ä¢ Image pasting is now supported directly onto the canvas

‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue where canvas pages would expand infinitely

‚Ä¢ Refined UI styles on the project share page for a cleaner look

Bug Fixes

‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue where deleting a table field via an agent caused data display errors

features.title: Clean layouts, better agents, no more stuck moments
features.description:
New

Canvas auto-layout and alignment guides

You can now clean up messy layouts with one click and get helpful alignment guides when placing elements on the image canvas. It‚Äôs easier than ever to keep things neat.

Improvements

The image canvas layout has been redesigned: the left-side chat box has been removed, the toolbar is now on the left, and the bottom panel has been replaced with a focused input bar. The generating animation has also been updated for a smoother experience.

Agents are no longer allowed to update field names in database schemas, preventing accidental loss of existing data.

Remix projects will now load even when subscription info is missing, avoiding unnecessary interruptions.

Bug Fixes

Fixed a crash when stopping a running agent task

Fixed canvas shift caused by scrollIntoView behavior

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

features.title: Gemini 3 Flash lands on Trickle
features.description:
Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Gemini 3 Flash is now available on Trickle, bringing faster responses, stronger visual understanding, and more stable reasoning across complex workflows.

What‚Äôs improved

Instant canvas response

Lower latency makes interactions feel immediate. Your canvas reacts as fast as your thinking, even in complex builds.

More coherent reasoning across iterations

Longer and cleaner context handling keeps ideas consistent as you iterate. Complex logic stays intact instead of drifting over time.

Stronger visual understanding

Visual inputs are interpreted with structural intent rather than treated as loose references. This results in more accurate layout, logic, and decision making when working with visual context.

What this means for building on Trickle

With Gemini 3 Flash, vibe coding feels faster without sacrificing quality. You spend less time explaining and correcting, and more time iterating and shaping ideas as they form.

The canvas keeps up with you.

Dive in here https://trickle.so/gemini3-flash

features.title: Seedream 4.5 upgrade
features.description:
Improvement

‚Ä¢ Upgraded the Seedream model to version 4.5

Bug Fixes

‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue where published sites still displayed the Trickle badge

‚Ä¢ Deleting text in the input box no longer removes selected images on the canvas

‚Ä¢ Fixed parameter click issues below generated videos

‚Ä¢ Fixed canvas offset/shift issues during interactions

‚Ä¢ Fixed an issue where the chat sidebar did not display image ratio settings

features.title: Nano Banana Pro is now live on Trickle
features.description:
Nano Banana Pro brings next-level image generation and creative control to Trickle. You‚Äôre no longer limited to static visuals or manual layout work. From product mockups and crisp infographics to vector-style graphics and complete creative workflows, everything can be built directly inside Trickle with Nano Banana Pro. Here‚Äôs what this upgrade unlocks:

Generate high-fidelity visuals with precise prompt control

Edit images interactively with maintained consistency

Unlock unlimited creative workflows, whether you‚Äôre designing marketing assets, UI components, or fully integrated content pieces

All of this is powered within your Trickle workspace, no separate tools required. Try it now ‚Üí https://trickle.so/nano-banana-pro

features.title: Gemini 3 is now live on Trickle
features.description:
Gemini 3 has landed on Trickle and the results honestly feel unreal.

Every single demo in the video was generated inside Trickle with Gemini 3 in one go. Content, structure, logic, interactions, UI layout, flow, SVG shapes, vector widgets, animations, code snippets, interactive components ‚Äì all generated automatically.

Just a few prompts and everything comes together at once, with speed and quality way beyond what we expected.

You can try Gemini 3 for free right now.

Open Settings ‚Üí Experimental Features and switch on the Model Toggle.

Go build something wild.

features.title: New Tools and Improvements
features.description:
New

Launched over 50 new tool pages.

Improvements

Added structured data schema to tools, blogs, and templates.

Enhanced tool page visibility for search bots by improving template linking, comment indexing, and FAQ content coverage.

Bugs

Files are being automatically added to a new project when switching quickly from a project detail page back to the home page.

features.title: Sonnet 4.5 is now default, and content gets a new home
features.description:
New

The default AI model has been updated to Claude Sonnet 4.5 for a more stable and capable generation experience.

Improvements

Blog, template, and tools pages previously hosted under content.trickle.so have been fully migrated to trickle.so for better SEO performance and cleaner URLs.

features.title: Experience the new Kimi K2 Turbo upgrade on Trickle
features.description:
News

Kimi K2 Turbo is now supported on Trickle. With this powerful new model, you can expect noticeably faster output and a smarter overall experience. It brings stronger coding and reasoning capabilities, handles complex context more effectively, and generates cleaner, more practical front-end code ‚Äî with better aesthetics too.

To try it out, go to your workspace settings, open the Experimental features section, and enable ‚ÄúSwitch model‚Äù to activate Kimi K2 Turbo.

Improvements

Improved error message display during login

Added SEO content to the Templates page

Added header field checks to prevent potential hijacking attacks

Bug Fixes

Fixed a white screen issue when opening share links in Safari on mobile

features.title: Fresh Content & Smoother Experience
features.description:
News

3 new blog posts are now live ‚Äî check them out for insights and inspiration

Improvements

Updated and optimized sitemap for better SEO coverage.

Pricing page loads faster with a smoother experience for logged-in users.

Component picker is now simpler. You can add components directly without extra page jumps.

features.title: Build Faster with Trickle Templates & Components
features.description:
Trickle apps & sites templates and components are live! The long-awaited feature is finally here. After countless requests from our community, Trickle is officially launching its very own templates & components Library packed with sleek animations, stylish cards, interactive buttons, and more, all ready to use out of the box.

Even better, it‚Äôs a true credit-saver, making your creation process smoother and more efficient.

Try it now üëâ trickle.so/templates

And this is just the beginning! Soon, we‚Äôll open up template & component trading, so you can publish and sell your own work directly on Trickle. Create, share, and monetize all in one place.

News

You can now selectively delete historical versions of your projects

A new navigation bar has been added to the homepage for faster access

Chat input is now available inside the Library. You can now generate images or videos directly from the Library using natural language prompts

Improvements

Refined the UI for Branding Settings to make it more intuitive

Major Help Center update with refreshed content and improved organization

Bug Fixes

Fixed an issue where remix project share links were incorrectly tied to the original project

features.title: üéâ Big update ‚Äî Generate image & video features are now live in Trickle
features.description:
News

You can now generate high-quality images and videos directly in Trickle, just write a prompt or upload a reference, and let the AI bring your ideas to life. Powered by models including Nana Banana, Seedream 4.0, and Seedance 1.0 Pro, the results are stunning and instantly usable in your site. You can:

Write a prompt or upload a reference image,

Generate custom visuals for your projects,

Instantly save outputs to your Library and upload them into your site,

Remix your images, refine them, and even generate videos from a single image,

This unlocks a whole new layer of creativity From immersive storytelling to advanced product showcases, here are a few ideas: Interactive story websites

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Hero banners with autoplay videos

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Dynamic product shots

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Improvements

Homepage mode has been renamed to Visual Mode, now supporting both image and video generation,

Added clear placeholders for generation inputs: ‚ÄúDescribe an image‚Äù and ‚ÄúDescribe a video‚Äù,

Video generation now supports image-based prompts, limited to one uploaded image,

Model selection on the homepage now defaults to a fixed option and no longer switches based on previous user toggles,

The Generate Video icon is now more prominently displayed above the selected image on the canvas,

Library dialog now auto-refreshes its data when opened

features.title: New tools, smoother canvas
features.description:
News

Over 50 new tools are now live in English, Japanese, Korean, and Portuguese ‚Äî that‚Äôs 200+ pages of AI-powered workflows, templates, and creative shortcuts. Whether you‚Äôre building landing pages or writing product copy, there‚Äôs something for every use case. Explore them here ‚Üí https://trickle.so/tools,

Improvements

Image Mode now supports drag-and-drop image upload directly onto the canvas

Bug Fixes

In Canvas Mode, images generated in Assets were not being saved to the Library,

In Canvas Mode, generating new images from an old Asset image caused both the original and new images to occasionally disappear,

When importing multiple images manually from the Library and asking AI to update the webpage, some images disappeared from Assets after the page was modified,

Improved label naming for mode options in the homepage input dropdown,

Resolved a bug that caused incorrect credit display for new users upon registration

features.title: Whiteboard to Image just dropped
features.description:
New
Whiteboard-to-Image is here

A major update. You can now sketch your idea directly on the whiteboard and turn it into an image instantly. It‚Äôs a smoother way to express your vision than typing prompts. Powered by Nano Banana üçå, what you draw is what the AI sees. Let your imagination lead the way.

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

You can also search for reference images from Unsplash right inside the canvas, then remix them with Banana to generate something entirely new.

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Database export

All data collected in Trickle can now be exported with one click.

New Tools page is live

We‚Äôve launched a dedicated Tools page on our website. No matter what industry you‚Äôre in, you‚Äôll find a use case that fits your workflow. Visit here: https://trickle.so/tools

Improvements

Smoother login experience ‚Äî the Trickle 2.0 intro video no longer appears after logging out and back in,

Improved socket reconnection behavior and UI feedback for better stability during network interruptions,

Updated referral icon with a clearer, more polished look,

Nano Banana image generation is now integrated into the asset panel, making it easier to use while building,

Better selection interactions on canvas

The Select button is now disabled until preview finishes loading,

Icons are excluded from multi-select to avoid accidental selection noise

features.title: Invoke AI model switch and credit handling improvements
features.description:
Improvements

Switched Invoke AI model to OpenAI GPT-5-mini

Bug Fixes

Fixed a billing credit issue when upgrading from Pro to Premium

features.title: üçåNano-bananaüçå is now in Trickle Magic Canvas
features.description:
Trickle Magic Canvas just got a big upgrade with nano-banana built right in. You can now generate images directly on the canvas, place them into the site you are building, and publish right away. It feels incredibly smooth when nano-banana meets the vibe coding canvas. Just describe what you need, and banana will create the visuals for you. This opens up a wide range of possibilities. Here are some examples: (edited)

Product Shots

Generate clean, consistent product visuals from a simple description and place them straight into your site. (edited)

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Multi View Displays,

Showcase the same product from multiple angles with a consistent style, all generated by banana.

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Parody Apps

Spin up fun apps in seconds. One demo lets every click bring Elon Musk and Ultraman Tiga into a hug.

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Hand Drawn Actions

A Trickle-built app that connects to banana. Upload two characters, sketch a simple stick figure move, and banana makes them act it out on the canvas.

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

OOTD Breakdown

Another Trickle-built app powered by banana. Upload an outfit photo and banana breaks it down into individual items for clean visuals.

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

Improvements

Increased the custom domain limit for Premium Plan to 3

Bug Fixes

Fixed an issue where newly built pages did not fully expand on the canvas

features.title: Now Live: Invite Friends and Earn Rewards üéÅ
features.description:
New

Earn rewards by inviting friends to try Trickle. Your friends get 200 credits when they sign up, and you earn 200 too when they publish their first site. Share the link, grow the community, and rack up credits along the way. To get started, log in to Trickle, click the gift icon in the top right corner, and copy your unique invitation link from the popup window. Share it with anyone who hasn‚Äôt signed up yet and start earning.

Improvement

Reduced scroll-to-zoom sensitivity on canvas and added a zoom menu for easier control

Added clearer UI cues in chat-only mode to improve visibility and guidance

Bug Fixes

Fixed an issue where AI-generated code caused unexpected sign-outs

Fixed a layout bug where the canvas toolbar was not centered after panning

Video is still processing, it should be ready shortly...

features.title: New Canvas Zoom Control, Smoother Navigation, and Stability Fixes
features.description:
New

Added a new zoom control to the canvas: you can now zoom in and out by clicking the zoom tool, and quickly refocus the view on the main content area. This improves navigation and overall usability on large canvases.

Bug Fixes

Fixed an issue where mouse tracking was not available on the canvas during AI-driven database operations.

Fixed a bug where AI-generated code with input autoFocus logic interfered with canvas drag functionality.

features.title: Bedrock & GPT-5 Mini Upgrade, Smarter Error Reporting, and Canvas Stability Fixes
features.description:
Improvements

Switched Claude Sonnet 4 model deployment to AWS Bedrock,

Upgraded in-app AI model to GPT-5 Mini (via OpenRouter),

Improved error reporting by detecting and filtering out Chrome extension errors,

Bug Fixes

Fixed an issue where some pages on the canvas occasionally failed to fully expand,

Fixed a bug where colored bounding boxes on the canvas didn‚Äôt disappear after AI responses completed,

Fixed a crash when clicking the refresh icon in the header while in Focus Mode

features.title: Easy Image Cropping, Better Home Input Hints & Smarter Preview Links
features.description:
New

Simple image editing ‚Äì uploaded assets/images now support basic crop.

Improvements

Home chat input ‚Äì clearer tips when adding assets, rules, and knowledge.

Preview links ‚Äì standardized the preview URL format so browsers recognize/share it more reliably.

Copy consistency ‚Äì unified the Sign out wording in Account settings.

Bug Fixes

Rename Project dialog ‚Äì the project name field no longer appears empty when renaming from the project dropdown.

features.title: Unpublish Controls, Domain Cache Fixes, and More Reliable Deploys
features.description:
New

Unpublish projects ‚Äì you can now unpublish a project manually, and deleting a project will automatically unpublish it.

Bug Fixes

Custom domains ‚Äì fixed an issue where cache invalidation didn‚Äôt properly clear for custom domains.

Chat images ‚Äì resolved errors that could occur when sending or viewing images in Chat.

Deploys after page deletion ‚Äì fixed a problem where deleted pages could still be accessed after redeploying.

features.title: Build with Gemini 2.5 Pro or Grok 4 or GPT-5, Flexible Dragging, and a New Web Search Tool
features.description:
New

Experimental features

Choose from multiple models (e.g., Gemini 2.5 Pro, Grok 4) when building apps.

Configurable dragging modes: free drag or layout-constrained drag.

Improvements

Web search tool ‚Äì fetch content directly from web pages.

Bug Fixes

Fixed an issue that prevented loading more messages when scrolling up in chat.

features.title: Cleaner Canvas History and Smarter Analytics
features.description:
Improvements

Canvas history tidy-up ‚Äì the default view shows only the latest version (down from five).

Instant image uploads in project chat ‚Äì images you paste upload immediately (now in sync with Home); image URLs now include w= and h= parameters for width and height.

Context-aware canvas drag ‚Äì in database view, canvas movement is disabled only when a scrollbar is present.

Comprehensive page-view analytics ‚Äì every page now reports events, giving richer insight.

Footer update ‚Äì ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs new‚Äù is now Changelog, linking straight to the full update log.

Bug Fixes

Fixed a rare issue where user messages could occasionally disappear from chat history.

features.title: Sharper FAQs, Sleeker Canvas, and an Improved Mobile Experience
features.description:
Improvements

Pricing FAQ refresh ‚Äì clearer, more helpful answers.

Updated site sitemap ‚Äì better SEO and easier crawling.

Touch Screen Canvas enhancements ‚Äì smoother interactions and improved compatibility.

Mobile input styling ‚Äì cleaner look and feel across small screens.

Bug Fixes

Fixed a lost-event issue when the socket reconnected during AI replies.

Restored correct behaviour for canvas following.

Resolved errors when loading additional chat history.

Corrected ‚Äúsmall changes‚Äù mishandling when edits contained the $1 placeholder.

Fixed the gradient background glitch on the Create button (Safari).

features.title: Smarter Chat, Cleaner UI, and a More Helpful Pricing Page
features.description:
New

Blog section‚Äôs been updated to new URL https://trickle.so/blog

Improvements

Added FAQs and updated metadata on the pricing page

Enabled streaming preview for pure HTML pages

You can now load more chat history.

Bug Fixes

User email is now hidden in community projects

Updated Twitter and OG image URLs

Fixed table styling issues for sites, rules, and knowledge views

Resolved socket reconnection errors that caused unexpected behavior

features.title: Introducing Magic Canvas: A Visual, Agentic Way to Build with AI
features.description:
New

We‚Äôve launched Trickle Magic Canvas, the core of a new way to build with AI, where you don‚Äôt just prompt, you co-create. Unlike traditional linear chats, Magic Canvas gives you a fully visual canvas to work alongside AI and build production-ready websites, apps, and forms.

Here‚Äôs what you can do with Magic Canvas:

Visually co-create with AI

Lay out pages, drag in assets, write notes, and add rules directly onto the canvas. The AI understands context not just through prompts, but through structure and layout.

Build multi-page apps in one flow

Create and organize entire product structures across multiple screens and flows, with versioning and clear visual hierarchy.

See how AI thinks

Watch every AI step unfold transparently, with real-time feedback and editable outputs. No more black box generations.

Directly edit any element

Click into any frame to tweak text, styles, and layout with instant feedback. All changes sync to clean, production-grade code behind the scenes.

Publish instantly

From canvas to live site, publish your work with one click. No extra tooling or setup required.

features.title: Introducing Trickle 1.5: A More Fluid Way to Build with AI
features.description:
New

Trickle 1.5 is here ‚Äî and it‚Äôs all about giving you more control, better AI collaboration, and a cleaner, more intuitive building experience. From visual polish to deeper agent intelligence, this update brings meaningful improvements to every step of the creation flow.

Here‚Äôs what‚Äôs new in 1.5:

Trickle Direct Edit

Instantly edit any text, style, or layout element directly on the canvas. No need to re-prompt or start over ‚Äî just click and change.

Smarter AI Agent

Our agent now supports automatic continuation, intelligent error recovery, and more natural interactions during the build process.

New Chat Mode

Collaborate with AI in a more conversational way. Ask questions, make requests, and guide the flow in back-and-forth dialogue.

Redesigned Interface

Cleaner layout, improved visual hierarchy, and a unified design system make the workspace easier to use and more consistent.

Dark Mode and Light Mode Toggle

Switch between themes anytime for a more comfortable building experience, day or night.

Improved Layout Engine

Better spacing, alignment, and responsiveness ‚Äî everything feels more intentional and balanced.

Updated Typography System

Enhanced type scale and clarity make your content more readable and polished across devices.

Whether you‚Äôre editing a landing page, customizing a form, or fine-tuning layout details, Trickle 1.5 makes it all feel faster, clearer, and more effortless.
